panels.title: Slowest Queries by Root Operation
panels.description: Average, max duration and count by API endpoint and SQL statement

panels.title: Slowest Queries by Service
panels.description: Average, max duration and count by service name and SQL statement

panels.title: Slowest Queries by Database
panels.description: Average, max duration and count by database system and SQL statement

panels.title: Slowest 100 Query Executions (Raw)
panels.description: Individual DB query executions sorted by duration

panels.title: Highest Impact Queries by Root Operation
panels.description: Ranked by Impact = Avg Duration × Count (high latency + high traffic = high impact)

panels.title: Highest Impact Queries by Service
panels.description: Ranked by Impact = Avg Duration × Count. Service = the service executing the SQL query.

panels.title: Highest Impact Queries by Database
panels.description: Ranked by Impact = Avg Duration × Count

panels.title: Slowest 100 Query Executions (Raw)
panels.description: Individual DB query executions sorted by duration
Baselines provide upper and lower bands around time series data to identify anomalies. Values that remain outside the bands for significant periods of time will be identified as anomalies.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (service_name, db_query_text, le) (rate(traces_span_metrics_duration_milliseconds_bucket{span_kind="SPAN_KIND_CLIENT", db_system=~".+", db_query_text="$db_query_text"}[5m])))

panels.title: Query Latency with Anomaly Bands

panels.description: Queries currently exceeding their anomaly detection bounds, showing how far outside normal range
panels.title: Anomalies in Time Range

list.description: Select a single SQL query to analyze for anomaly detection.
list.label: SQL Query
list.name: db_query_text

title: Slow SQL - Unified
description: Single dashboard: By Duration, Traffic Weighted, and Anomaly Detection.
